articles.title: Why Jamal Murray Is the Breakout Performer of the Year - Sports Illustrated

articles.content: There’s a moment in the fourth quarter of Game 4 of the 2020 Western Conference finals when Nuggets guard Jamal Murray pulls off, frankly, one of the most absurd shots in NBA history. Some shots in t… [+5679 chars]
